body_html:
This is fixed in r1.4 using the tf.Estimator, eg.

config = tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.5))
trainingConfig = tf.estimator.RunConfig(session_config=config)
estimator = tf.estimator.Estimator(config=trainingConfig, ...)

will work as desired. I don't think it's expected to be fixed in the deprecated tf.contrib.learn.Estimator.

config = tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.5))

will work as desired. I don't think it's expected to be fixed in the deprecated tf.contrib.learn.Estimator.
body:
This is fixed in r1.4 using the tf.Estimator, eg.
```
config = tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.5))
trainingConfig = tf.estimator.RunConfig(session_config=config)
estimator = tf.estimator.Estimator(config=trainingConfig, ...)
```
will work as desired. I don't think it's expected to be fixed in the deprecated `tf.contrib.learn.Estimator`.
